snippet: For the first time since emergency drought regulations took effect this year, Californians failed to meet the 25 percent water reduction target set by Gov. Jerry Brown.
abstract: California fails to meet 25 percent water reduction target set by Gov Jerry Brown for the first time since emergency drought regulations were set in place; October usage was reduced by only 22.2 percent.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since emergency drought regulations took effect this year, Californians failed to meet the 25 percent water reduction target set by Gov. Jerry Brown.

headline.main: California: State Falls Short of Water Goal
headline.print_headline: California: State Falls Short of Water Goal
